name: Wildlife Camping Experience
description:
Submission for Mashup GameJam 2! (Unconventional means)

Ever wondered what animals think about you, parking your car near your campsite in the woods? THEY HATE IT.

Help an angry rabbit to remove a campers car from the forest while not driving it (the bun has no drivers license!) by using conveyor belts, bombs, heavy oil and all other kinds of rabbit possesions.

Done in 72 hours by Maximilian T. Schmitt
